manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MERRYBOX Multifunctional Over The Sink Dish Drying Rack Adjustable Are you still worrying about the mess in kitchen space? MERRYBOX 065 over the sink dish rack can help you make the kitchen tidy in seconds. Our practical over sink dish drying rack aims to keep all the counter stuffs tidy & dry easily and make your kitchen highly organized. It can hold a lot with large capacity, you can store all the dishware as you like such as bowls, plates, pans, vegetables and fruits, detergent, rags, etc. A definitely necessary kitchen organizer to keep you away from past chaos! Why choose our dish rack? Exclusive card slot, firmly placed - The card slot design can firmly jam the dishes without worrying about falling.Thickened steel frame and strong load-bearing capacity - Stable structure and not leaning forward, you can safely place bowls and dishes.Adopt high-quality painted carbon steel frame which is beautiful and strong, does not fade, and is resistant to rust. (Paint layer plus carbon steel layer)

Adjustable Length For Most Single Or Double Kitchen Sinks Fits For Most Sinks in Your Kitchen Inner length: 25 - 33 inchesOutside length: 26 - 34 inchesThe height of the faucet ≤ 20 inches ** Measure Carefully before Purchase ** Please loosen the screws and pull the crossbars and vertical bars according to your preference.

Rustproof & Durable The dish drying rack uses advanced carbon steel and covered with high temperature coating finish, ensure long lasting durability, Rust Resistance and Scratch Resistance, easy to clean. Upgraded Card Slot The enhanced hollow card slot is stronger to keep balance when store more dishes; removable design, convenient for adjust the assemblies by your needs. Sense of Stability The U-shaped structure balances the pressure at the top brackets, this strengthen the durability and stability. You don't have to worry about dishes falling off and broken issues.

Keep Clean & Dry The dripping water falls into the sink when you transfer all the washed dishes to the dish drying rack, no more worries about that the kitchen countertop getting wet and dirty. Non-slip & Stable Attached four strong suction cups, which strengthen the stability of the whole dish drying rack and prevents sliding at any case. High Capacity With excellent load-bearing capacity, even if you put heavy tableware such as frying pots, pans and rice cooker on the rack, it'll still keep totally balance without leaning or shaking.

How to protect and maintain: In daily use, carbon steel products will not rust, but if they are used improperly, the surface will have "mold growth" and "floating rust". This is because the product is not thoroughly cleaned after use, and the dirt is attached to the product and formed on the surface. 1. During maintenance, do not scratch the surface of carbon steel, and do not use the steel wool or bleaching detergent for cleaning. 2. If there is a lot of dust on the surface, you can use weak detergent to clean it to protect the carbon steel from being damaged. If you accidentally leave grease stains on the surface, you can wipe it with a soft cloth and then clean it with a neutral detergent to ensure a beautiful effect. 3. Special attention to carbon steel: avoid acid, alkali, salt, like these corrosive things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfectly for my small space.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mainly to clear up counter space in my small kitchen. It is perfect for that. It’s strong and sturdy and doesn’t move once put in place. And it’s easy to put together. I love all the organization it offers as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Space Saver
reviews.reviewText: I live in a small home with very little counter space. I specifically bought this based on price, reviews, & the ability to save space. It came disassembled but took less than an hour to put together. My only feedback is the video you watch that shows assembly needed better centering & longer views on the parts before adding. However, it was not difficult (& I am NOT mechanically inclined at all).I have a cabinet in the right side of my sink so my advice is to be mindful of anything on the upper end that may limit room for this item. It ended up working out!There’s room for 3 stemmed glasses to dry.I’m very happy with this item in general! It’s given me an entire counter to use, which prior held dish towels and dishes.It’s a great price and feels sturdy!Photos include empty and with a few dishes to show how it functions in real life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again
reviews.reviewText: The MERRYBOX Over The Sink Dish Drying Rack, with its adjustable length ranging from 25 to 33 inches and multiple tiers, is designed to offer practicality and convenience in kitchen organization. Its adjustable feature allows it to fit different sink sizes, catering to various kitchen layouts.The inclusion of multiple baskets, utensil holders, and a cup holder enhances its functionality, providing ample space for drying dishes, cutlery, and utensils after washing. The tiered design ensures efficient use of space, allowing for air circulation to dry items effectively.Durability and stability are essential factors in a dish drying rack, as it needs to support wet dishes without compromising its structure. Additionally, the ease of assembly and cleaning can significantly impact user experience.Potential buyers might appreciate a detailed examination of the rack’s material quality, rust-resistant properties, and sturdiness, along with user reviews to gauge its performance in real-life kitchen scenarios.Ultimately, a comprehensive review should address the rack’s adaptability to various sink sizes, its durability, capacity, ease of assembly, and overall functionality as a kitchen organizer to assist potential buyers in making an informed decision. Checking updated reviews and user feedback can provide valuable insights into the practicality and effectiveness of the MERRYBOX Over The Sink Dish Drying Rack

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I do not have much counter space in my kitchen so this has been so nice! I absolutely love it! Very happy with this purchase. My sink seems to be a bit wide so the middle is not as sturdy as preferred but so long as I don't over fill it or put anything stupid heavy on it, it's fine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great buy! This product is an affordable price and is super easy to install. I put it together by myself in under ten minutes. It is the perfect size ( true to description) and saves us a huge amount of space on our counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: This fitted over my kitchen sink perfectly. It looks great, seems very solid, and has a variety of draining racks and boxes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Some pieces were bent
reviews.reviewText: Some pieces were bent. could be the way it was packed and you could bend them back a bit, but the shelves are not level, so the dishes could fall off. there is a not in the box that says that they resend and package returns for resale so if your item isn't correct to contact the seller and not return the item to Amazon. I didn't bother. I use it but am just careful with what i put on it. it's a great space saver

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: If you follow my reviews you know I recently moved, and my kitchen design had been a challenge. Limited cabinet space in particular.I didn't purchase this for what it's designed for at least not just that purpose.I organized the dishes that I regularly use on this rack so they're always accessible. I use them, clean them, and put them back on the rack. This freed up a whole cabinet for other cooking supplies I needed to store.Everything is at my fingertips now, plates, bowls, cups, glasses, cleaning products, etc. It is working exactly as I imagined, so I'm super happy!This was easy to assemble. The suction on the legs doesn't really work, but it's positioned so it doesn't slip.These tray are truly strudy. I was initially worried about my plates and bowls. This is a pretty heavy dish set, but the trays are holding up perfectly, and not giving me any reasons yet to worry.The glass holder I had to play with, and never really got it right. It doesn't really hold 4 regular size glasses. I have two regular and two small and it's still not perfectly secure. To address this issues I was able to positioned my other organizers right next to it, so it keeps the glasses secure and ensures they don't tip over-- if yours has no support just be careful or put less glasses on it.My cups are a little small, so they fit perfectly.The knife rack is odd, none of my knives really fit, but I made it work. Again this keeps things I regularly use right at my fingertips, and I don't have to go searching for them in a drawer.I still have a few unused hooks, so this is very efficient. Got this one on sale, so super great value in my opinion.

reviews.reviewTitle: It works as intended and looks great.
reviews.reviewText: I love this product! It can hold so many dishes including pots and pans. I am not sure why people are saying it isn't sturdy. I have had many people compliment it and even decide to buy them for themselves lol.The only issue I had was a broken screw. When I went to assemble it, the screw was just hanging off and broke as soon as I touched it. Picture provided. Still trying to figure out how to get a new one, but so far it is sturdy without it.
Buen tamaño, un bonito diseño y muy práctico, super recomendado.<3

reviews.reviewTitle: 組み立て簡単で使いやすい
reviews.reviewText: 想像以上に値段に対して満足度高いです

reviews.reviewTitle: Good use of over sink space!
reviews.reviewText: Our daughter has very little counter space near her sink. This provided an ideal solution, making good use of the space over the sink for drying dishes, silverware, etc. Product is fairly sturdy, easy to assemble, and adjustable to most sink spaces.

This is exactly what we needed. Cleared so much space for us. We didn't use some of the attachments due to where our cupboards sit or had no use for. It is quite sturdy when assembled and in place. (Watch the video instructions to make your life much easier during assembly. Made it easier to understand the picture instructions).It did have one scratch on a bar but very minor. I also found the suction chips did best with a bit of moisture on them then pressed firmly. Very impressed they included extra suction cups as well!The only note I would mention is that they advertise being able to hold plates and bowels and cups in the top tracks but I found the inner corners sagged and this has probably led to the complaints in other reviews. I didn't have plans to put that up there though so it is no issue to me. I put tupperware lids and small hard to dry plastic items in the baskets. See my pictures. The knife holder needs a review by the company as the slats are easy too big for knives to sit in it. They slide right through the top.Those are the only two notable mentions and drew off 1 star in sturdiness. But as I said it didn't affect my use. Really good price and fast shipping.
